headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin exposing only the Philips Hue Tap Dial (RDM002) as a keypad with password logic.
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [wiki](https://github.com/ebaauw/homebridge-hue/wiki/Configuration)

name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log.

userId.description: Bridge ID (16 hex chars) for the credential below. Optional convenience field for Config UI.

userToken.description: Hue API username (token) for the bridge above. Optional convenience field for Config UI.

nativeHomeKitSensors.description: Don't expose sensors already exposed by the v2 (square) Hue bridge.

tapDialButtons.description: Expose individual button services for the Hue Tap Dial (RDM002). Default: false. When false, only the keypad success MotionSensor is exposed.

brightnessAdjustment.description: Adjustment factor for brightness for adaptive lighting.  Default: 100.

configuredName.description: Expose Configured Name characteritic.  Default: false.

forceHttp.description:
Use plain HTTP instead of HTTPS. Default: false.
Note that this will also disable the use of the Hue bridge event stream.

hueDimmerRepeat.description: Enable repeat mode for the Hue dimmer switch (Dim Up and Dim Down buttons) and the Hue smart button.

hueMotionTemperatureHistory.description: Expose the temperature sensor of the Hue motion sensor as a separate HomeKit accessory, to enable temperature history in Eve.

homebridgeHue2.title: Homebridge Hue2
homebridgeHue2.description: ID of the Homebridge Hue2 migration resource link.

linkButton.description: Expose the link button on the Hue bridge.

nativeHomeKitLights.description: Don't expose lights already exposed by the v2 (square) Hue bridge.

noResponse.description: Report unreachable lights as No Response in HomeKit.

ownResourcelinks.description: Only consider resource links owned by the API key running Homebridge Hue.

parallelRequests.description: The number of ansynchronous requests homebridge-hue sends in parallel to a Hue bridge.  Default: 3 or 10 (depending on the bridge).

resetTimeout.description: The time, in milliseconds, after which pulse-like controls (e.g. for recalling a scene) reset.  Default: 500.

stealth.description: Stealth mode: don't make any calls to the Internet.  Default: false.

timeout.description: The timeout in seconds to wait for a response from a Hue bridge.  Default: 5.

waitTimePut.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait after sending a PUT request, before sending the next PUT request.  Default: 50.

waitTimePutGroup.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait after sending a PUT request to a group, before sending the next PUT request.  Default: 1000.

waitTimeResend.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait before resending a request after an ECONNRESET or http status 503 error.  Default: 300.

waitTimeUpdate.description: The time, in milliseconds, to wait for a change from HomeKit to another characteristic for the same light or group, before updating the Hue bridge.  Default: 20.

wallSwitch.description: Indicate that you use traditional wall switches to power off your lights.

items.title: Expose Tap Dial Buttons
items.description: When enabled, exposes individual button services (switches 1, 2, 4, 5, rollers 5,6) in addition to the keypad MotionSensor.

items.title: Bridge
items.description: Hostname or IPv4 address of the Hue bridge.
